code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../Styles/ResetPassword.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ResetPassword=()=>{const[newPassword,setNewPassword]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/reset-password',{phone:localStorage.getItem('phone'),newPassword});setMessage(res.data.message);navigate('/login');}catch(err){setMessage(err.response.data.error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reset-password-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Reset Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Enter new password",value:newPassword,onChange:e=>setNewPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Reset Password"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});};export default ResetPassword;
